column4: Is there a way to allow the installation of packages from "not authenticated sources"?
try from terminal sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get upgrade
I'll try that instead of using synaptic...
did you tried to run commands from terminal and did you get any errors
you can try with sudo apt-get dist-upgrade in case that some packages are hold
as KM0201 give us pastebin of sudo apt-get upgrade
